main event: A 14-year-old youth reported observing 3 glowing objects that moved about erratically and then exploded.
interesting points: The sighting occurred on a September night in 1963 at 22:30., The objects were reported to have moved in an erratic manner before exploding., Duration of the sighting was around 2 minutes., No definite conclusions could be drawn due to insufficient information., The incident raised public curiosity about UFOs in the local community.
sighted object: three glowing objects in the sky
